title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Michael Brack
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 15 – December 2007 Cover Art Sunken City Michael is an autodidact artist specialized in dark art, both traditional and digital. He enjoys things like haunted houses, monsters, desolated landscapes... The mood created by a drawing is the most important thing for me. He currently live in Paris, France. Skip to content
Issue 15 – December 2007
Cover Art
Sunken City
Michael is an autodidact artist specialized in dark art, both traditional and digital. He enjoys things like haunted houses, monsters, desolated landscapes... The mood created by a drawing is the most important thing for me. He currently live in Paris, France.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
